shot.camera_system: Sony Venice with Rialto Extension System
shot.primary_lens: Zeiss Supreme Prime 35mm T1.5, wide open (T1.5) for shallow depth of field
shot.composition: Medium close-up (MCU), slightly low angle, rule of thirds, focus on the subject's face and the screen's reflection
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-4s): Very slow, smooth push-in (Dolly In) on the subject, 4 seconds duration, executed via a stabilized gimbal (e.g., Ronin 2). Sequence 2 (4-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.

physical.posture: Relaxed, curled up on the sofa, head slightly tilted towards the screen

facial_features.eyes: Half-closed, focused, reflecting the screen's light, expression of deep contentment and relaxation

wardrobe.accessories: Minimalist silver ring on the right hand

sequences.primary_motion: Subtle, rhythmic breathing, slight movement of the eyes following the action on the screen, a slow, gentle sip from a mug
sequences.camera_follows: Close tracking of the initial action

sequences.primary_motion: The subject continues the action with increased confidence and detail. Subtle, rhythmic breathing, slight movement of the eyes following the action on the screen, a slow, gentle sip from a mug evolves into a more complete demonstration, showing mastery and precision.
sequences.camera_follows: Medium shot capturing the full context and environment interaction

sequences.primary_motion: The subject completes the action with a satisfied expression, looks at the result with approval, and shows a subtle smile of accomplishment. Final moment captures the positive outcome.
sequences.camera_follows: Close-up on facial expression and final result, ending with a confident pose

scene.location: Modern, minimalist living room, focused on a deep velvet sofa (dark blue or emerald green)

layout.width: Cozy, intimate space, soft blankets and pillows (hygge style)
layout.flooring: Light oak wood floor, partially covered by a thick, cream-colored rug
layout.walls: Dark, matte accent wall behind the sofa, with a subtle, warm glow from a floor lamp

scene.time_of_day: Late evening (22:00), outside is completely dark

environment.background: Large, high-resolution TV screen displaying a vibrant, dramatic scene from a fictional series, the only significant light source in the room
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.primary_source: Practical light from the TV screen (blue/white) and a warm, soft fill light from a nearby floor lamp (tungsten, 2700K)
lighting.quality: Soft, low-key lighting (chiaroscuro effect), high contrast between the subject's face and the dark background
lighting.color_temperature: Mixed lighting: 5600K (screen) and 2700K (lamp), creating a rich, cozy atmosphere
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Deep blues, warm oranges, and rich blacks (Teal and Orange cinematic look)
color_grading.tone: Warm, intimate, and highly saturated, emphasizing comfort and the immersive experience

audio.ambient: Very low-level, muffled city sounds from outside (distant traffic, faint siren)
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-4s): Soft, subtle sound of the woman taking a sip from her mug, gentle rustle of the blanket, low-frequency rumble from the TV's sound system. Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: None, only the diegetic sound from the TV show (dramatic score, dialogue snippets) at a moderate volume The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: Without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles, hyperrealistic rendering
visual_rules.realism: Credible architectural environment with authentic materials. Realistic natural lighting according to time and weather. Consistent furnishing and decoration details. Correct spatial perspectives and proportions.
visual_rules.continuity: Consistency of natural light according to temporal progression. Maintenance of architectural and decorative style. Continuity of exterior views through windows. Smooth spatial flow and discovery.
